description: Update an EKS Anywhere Subscription. Only auto renewal and tags can be updated after subscription creation.

parameters.name: autoRenew
parameters.description: A boolean indicating whether or not to automatically renew the subscription.

parameters.name: clientRequestToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: subscription
nested_items.description: The full description of the updated subscription.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the subscription.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp in seconds for when the subscription was created.

nested_items.name: effectiveDate
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp in seconds for when the subscription is effective.

nested_items.name: expirationDate
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp in seconds for when the subscription will expire or auto renew, depending on the auto renew configuration of the subscription object.

nested_items.name: licenseQuantity
nested_items.description: The number of licenses included in a subscription. Valid values are between 1 and 100.

nested_items.name: licenseType
nested_items.description: The type of licenses included in the subscription. Valid value is CLUSTER. With the CLUSTER license type, each license covers support for a single EKS Anywhere cluster.

nested_items.name: duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the subscription term. Valid values are 12 and 36, indicating a 12 month or 36 month subscription.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The term unit of the subscription. Valid value is MONTHS.

nested_items.name: autoRenew
nested_items.description: A boolean indicating whether or not a subscription will auto renew when it expires.

nested_items.name: licenseArns
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services License Manager ARN associated with the subscription.

nested_items.name: licenses
nested_items.description: Includes all of the claims in the license token necessary to validate the license for extended support.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: An id associated with an EKS Anywhere subscription license.

nested_items.name: token
nested_items.description: An optional license token that can be used for extended support verification.
